projects.title: Kyanite Bank
projects.subtitle: Technologies used: JavaFX, Maven, JUnit, and File I/O
projects.description: Kyanite Bank is a comprehensive application developed to provide a secure and efficient solution for managing bank accounts and transactions.

projects.title: Book Discussion Forum
projects.subtitle: Technologies used: Spring MVC, Spring boot, Maven, JUnit
projects.description: Forum designed to provide a platform for users to view books, share reviews, and engage in discussions about their favorite literary works.

projects.title: Ancient Relic's Library
projects.subtitle: Technologies used: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, PHP, MySQL
projects.description: Ancient Relic's Library is a platform that showcases a collection of ancient relics, providing information & historical context for each item.
